div.p: From the Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle, Paris
RB MSS M199, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 9pt; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in;

note.p: An unsigned copy of this letter, differing slightly in accenting and punctuation, is in the personal dossier on M maintained by the Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle, now at Archives Nationales, Paris, MS AJ/15/549. The copy is annotated 'avec une lettre de Mr. le Profr. d'Erpetologie' [with a letter from the Professor of Herpetology [i.e. August Duméril]]; a note of the same date, also in the dossier, from Duméril to the clerk Prévost, asking him to prepare without delay the letter to M, also indicates tht Dumeril is writing a personal letter to M to be enclosed with the official one. However, no such letter from Duméril has been found.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: Paris le 23. Juillet 1862.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Monsieur,

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Nous avons l'honneur de vous adresser ci joint le Diplôme du titre de Correspondant du Muséum d'histoire Naturelle que vous a décerné dans sa dernière Séance l'assemblée des Professeurs administrateurs de cet établissement

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Nous désirons vivement que vous veuillez bien voir dans cet acte un témoignage de la haute estime de l'assemblée en même temps que de sa reconnaissance des dons précieux par lesquels vous avez enrichi les collections du Muséum.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Veuillez, Monsieur, agréer avec l'expression de ces sentiments celle de notre considération la plus distinguée.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Les Professeurs administrateurs du Muséum

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Le Directeur, E Chevreul

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Le Secrétaire, A Aug Duméril.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: A Monsieur le Docteur Ferdinand Mueller, Directeur du Jardin botanique et zoologique de Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Museum of Natural History

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p: Paris 23 July 1862

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Sir,

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
We have the honour of sending you the enclosed Diploma of appointment as Correspondent of the Museum of Natural History which the assembly of the administering Professors of this institution awarded you at its last meeting.
See Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle, Paris to M, 22 July 1862 (in this edition as 62-07-22a).

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: We earnestly hope that you will see in this a token of the assembly's high esteem as well as its recognition of the valuable donations by which you have enriched the Museum's collections.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Please, Sir, accept with the expression of these sentiments, that of our highest esteem.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
